page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE IN BUNNY
page.content: My name is{Samantha Jane Cooke.}I am eleven years old and I live in Bunny. I wake up at seven o'clock in the morning. I go to the bathroom for a wash, clean my teeth and get dressed. Then I brush my hair and go downstairs and have my breakfast which is a piece of toast and I listen to the radio. After breakfast I take my two dogs for a little walk and feed my guinea pig. Then I call for my friend Louise and all my other friends meet me there. At eight thirty we walk to{Bunny School. We talk in the playground. The bell goes at nine o'clock and we start work. I stay at school for my dinner. After school I go home and get changed for gymnastics. Then I go to meet my friend and her mum takes us to the gymnasium. We leave at nine o'clock. I have a glass of milk and watch TV. before I go to bed at ten o'clock.
